items: Place the resistance band around a sturdy object, such as a pole or door handle, at ankle height.
Stand facing the object with your feet hip-width apart and the band around the balls of your feet.
Hold onto a nearby surface for balance if needed.
Raise your heels off the ground, keeping your toes on the ground and your legs straight.
Hold the raised position for a few seconds, then slowly lower your heels back down to the ground.
Repeat for desired number of reps.

content.title: Resistance Band Calf Raise Form & Visual

items: Can be done anywhere with a resistance band
Targets the gastrocnemius and soleus muscles
Can be easily modified for different levels of resistance
